title: Zac-ish junglers
body:
Hi guys
 
I play a lot of Zac, I guess he could easily be considered my "main" and is my favourite champion by far. However, due to his rise in the meta and professional play, he is being picked and banned more often than he used to be.

Because of this I need another jungle pick. Can you guys suggest some junglers that have a similar play style as Zac, or at least good gankers that are tanky as well? Bonus points if they have a high damage build I can use periodically if Top picks a tank.

Thanks guys

replies.body:
I have the same problem with Sol :(
stupid pros at worlds!

but my guess would be 
**Sejuani.**

She is not as immobile as you would believe, she is incredibly tanky does insane damage, and like Zac her ganks come from nowhere.
She builds similar to him as well, being an AP mage-esq tank. 
Plus a good ranged AoE stun never goes amis.
Sejuani is free this week, it's a sign!
Haha yeah I completely forgot about Sej. I played her once on free week but since then nada. I'll make a piont to buy and play her soon, I've almost got enough IP
Gragas. He is mobile like Zac, has a great tank build while still being able to dole out some punishment.

I totally agree.
Great gank potential, very chubby (tanky), BUT the only bad thing is that he's a meta jungler atm, so he might get banned too
Same things I was thinking, although I have never tried him out. I'll give him a go.
Sej is a strong pick atm. Going to learn her when s6 ends.
